channel.title: A little fun
channel.description: Alright, this is just to bring some fun around for a little while, and possibly a few laughs. Rules are as, you fill out the 5 questions (permission of 2 blanks at most) about the person who posted above you. If you don't know them, get creative, maybe even sexual. This is the internet, use your imagination. [code] I think you are ____ I would _____ you We need to _____ I really love your _____ I want you to_____ [/code] I will do myn when I get up for work.

item.title: A little fun
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

I think you are a really truthful guy

I really love your courage to stand up for stupid topics
I want you to KILL CASEY AND DIGEST HIS INTERNAL ORGANS IN A BLENDER, MIX THEM WITH VINIGAR AND SLURP THEM UP IN ONE GULP.
